font_family.headings: Noto Serif Armenian, Playfair Display, serif

primary.description: Deep Pomegranate Red - The soul of the brand

secondary.description: Soft Apricot/Tuff Stone - Warmth and heritage

background.description: Warm Alabaster/Pale Rose - Not pure white

visual_enhancers.textures: Use subtle grain overlay on hero sections to mimic paper/organic feel

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 rounded-full px-8 py-3 font-medium transition-all shadow-lg hover:shadow-primary/20
buttons.secondary: bg-white text-primary border border-primary/20 hover:bg-primary/5 rounded-full px-8 py-3 font-medium transition-all

cards.product: group relative bg-white rounded-2xl overflow-hidden border border-border/50 transition-all duration-300 hover:border-primary/20

homepage.hero: Asymmetrical 'Tetris' grid. Large hero image (60%) + Typography block (40%). Overlapping elements.
homepage.featured: Horizontal scroll with 'snap-x' or a masonry grid for 'Artistic' feel.
homepage.marquee: Slow moving 'Editorial Ribbon' with Armenian calligraphy or floral icons.

product_list.filters: Sticky sidebar or minimal top bar with 'Pill' shaped toggles.

product_detail.layout: Split screen. Left: Sticky Image Gallery (Vertical stack). Right: Scrollable details.
product_detail.typography: Huge product title (Serif). Price in Accent color.

admin.style: Clean, high-density but airy. White cards on soft gray background.
admin.table: Minimalist rows, no vertical borders, soft hover states.

hero_main.alt: Elegant lavender dianthus bouquet in amber vase

general: Use 'Noto Serif Armenian' for all Headings. If not available, import it from Google Fonts.
Ensure all text is in Armenian (use Google Translate or mock Armenian text if needed, but preferably use placeholders like 'Ծաղիկներ', 'Մեր մասին', 'Կապ').
Do not use generic 'Lorem Ipsum'. Use Armenian mock text.
Use 'framer-motion' for page transitions and hover effects.
admin_panel: Protect with a simple mock login (password: 'admin123').
Use a different layout wrapper for Admin (Sidebar + Topbar).
Allow Image Upload (mock by accepting file and showing preview).
mock_data: Create a 'flowers.json' or constant file with at least 8-10 diverse flower products.
Include fields: id, name (Armenian), price, category, color, image, description.

universal_guidelines: Avoid 'AI Slop' - no generic centered layouts.
